title.rendered: OFFROAD ANIMAL ROCK SLIDERS FOR LAND CRUISER 300 SERIES 2022 ON

content.rendered:
Rock Sliders, Suitable for Toyota Land Cruiser 300 Series, 2022 to Current

Benefits

  • Seriously protects side of your Land Cruiser
  • Handy step for getting in and out of your wagon or accessing roof rack
  • Looks way better than any other slider out there
  • Did I mention these bad boys look fully sick bro
  • Easy install

Features

  • Side Curtain Air Bag compatible.
  • Angled up by 30 degrees for awesome off-road clearance.
  • Heavy duty steel brackets mount individually direct to chassis and to backbone
  • Crazy strong backbone, made from Aluminium 6061 T6 Extrusion
  • Tough steel step with extruded tread for nice look and feel, and actually works heaps better than diamond plate for grip

Suits all LC300 models 2022-on except the GR Sport or any with KDSS

 

Weight:48.00 KGS

 

PLEASE NOTE: Depending on stock & availability, the current wait time for this product is approx. 30 – 90 days from date of order. 

CLICK HERE to view the range of products available for your Toyota Land Cruiser!
Follow us on Instagram and Facebook to keep up to date with what’s going on in our workshop!
